name: Salido Inc.
description: Developer of a restaurant operating system platform designed to manage customer data easily. The company's platform is a cloud-based application that offers a point of sale, CRM, advanced reports, labor management and kitchen supply management, enabling restaurant owners to manage and keep track of their data accurately.
